sentences.en: ‘Are you Italian?’ ‘No, I’m Spanish.’
sentences.cn: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”

sentences.en: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.cn: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.en: ‘Do you want any more?’ ‘No thanks.’
sentences.cn: “你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.en: "I told you Preskel had no idea," remarked Kemp with some asperity.
sentences.cn: “我告诉过你普雷斯克毫不知情的，”肯普颇为不耐烦地说道。

sentences.en: "It's not one of my favourite forms of music." — "No."
sentences.cn: “这不是我喜欢的音乐形式。”——“对，这不是。”

sentences.en: "Wait there!" Kathryn rose. "No, on second thought, follow me."
sentences.cn: “在那儿等着！”凯瑟琳站起身来，“不，我改主意了。跟我来。”

sentences.en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
sentences.cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

sentences.en: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.cn: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.en: He would have to accept it; there was no other way.
sentences.cn: 对此他将别无选择，只有接受。

sentences.en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentences.cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentences.en: If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.cn: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

sentences.en: No detail was too small to escape her attention.
sentences.cn: 再小的细节都逃不过她的眼睛。

sentences.en: recession or no recession there is always going to be a shortage of good people.
sentences.cn: 不管经济景不景气，好人总是太少。

sentences.en: she'd have ridden there, winter or no.
sentences.cn: 是不是冬天，她都会乘车去那儿的。

sentences.en: Sixty percent of people voted no.
sentences.cn: 60%的人投了反对票。

sentences.en: The answer was a definite no.
sentences.cn: 回答是绝对不行。

sentences.en: The deal seems so attractive it would be ridiculous to say no.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易看上去太诱人了，要是拒绝它简直是笑话。

sentences.en: The police told me. It was a bombshell. I had no idea.
sentences.cn: 是警察告诉我的。我很震惊，完全没想到。

sentences.en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentences.cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

sentences.en: Their replies were no more than grunts of acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 他们所谓的回答不过是表示承认的咕哝罢了。

sentences.en: There is no suggestion that clients have been sold inappropriate policies.
sentences.cn: 无迹象表明向客户售出了不适用的保险。

sentences.en: There was no doubting the animal magnetism of the man.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，这个男人身上透着一种野性魅力。

sentences.en: They have no wish for any change in the status quo.
sentences.cn: 他们不想改变现状。

sentences.en: they no longer live here.
sentences.cn: 他们不再住在这了。

sentences.en: Though his background was modest, it was in no sense deprived.
sentences.cn: 尽管他家境一般，但也并不算贫穷。

sentences.en: You think she's alone? No way.
sentences.cn: 你以为她一个人？绝不可能。

words.tran_cn: 反对,反对票,反对的决定

phrases.phrase: not take no for an answer
phrases.tran_cn: 非取得同意不可；坚持己见

trans.tran_cn: (用于构成比较级的否定形式)根本不，毫不
trans.tran_en: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request

trans.tran_cn: 没有，完全不是，并非，禁止

trans.tran_en: used on signs to say that something is not allowed
used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request
